commands.msg: Pay the cost for $name's Special Summon effect?
options: label=Banish 3 cards from your Extra Deck face-down¬search(1,5,[1],"NAME != Dreaming Nemleria")
label=Send cards from the top of your Deck to the GY so you have the same number of cards in your Deck as your opponent¬source=0¬dest=2¬rand={count(0)-count(0, true)}
label=Banish the top 10 cards of your Deck face-down¬is_cost¬source=0¬dest=5¬rand=10

label=Excavate cards from the top of your Deck until you excavate a monster that can be Normal Summoned/Set. Special Summon it, also send the other excavated cards to the GY¬excavate_until(LVL >= 0 && CAN_NORMAL_OR_SET)¬source=0¬dest=2¬rand($num_excavated)

commands.msg: Banish 3 or 6 cards from your Extra Deck?
Resolve the first part of $name's effect?
options: label=Shuffle 5 monsters from your GY into your Deck¬search(2, 0, [2], "LVL >= 0")
label=Banish 3 or 6 cards of your choice from your Extra Deck, face-down¬is_cost¬search(1, 5, [1])
